EmailTemplate.description: Notifies GNG user that GNG has been Rejected (US)
EmailTemplate.name: GNG Rejection Notification - English only
EmailTemplate.subject: Notifies GNG user that GNG has been Rejected (US)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Approver__c} has rejected the Go decision for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Opportunity__c}. Click here to review the GNG record: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Link} and any rejection comments.
